Purpose: Stores user ID, face encodings, voice embeddings, preferences
Logs detected object attributes (shape, colour, position, etc.)
Logs symbolic gestures with confidence scores
Holds fused multi-modal instructions for task generation
Defines reusable robot actions (e.g., pick, travel, drop)
Stores final task plans generated by the LLM and mapped to robot actions
Tracks all authentication events (method, timestamp, outcome)
Logs interaction history for contextual personalization
Captures feedback from Isaac Sim and real-world execution
